front.title: Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for the European Emergency Services

abstract.t: This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) "eena" for Uniform Resource Name (URN) resources published by the European Emergency Number Association (EENA). EENA defines and manages resources that utilize this URN model. Management activities for these and other resource types are provided by the European Emergency Services Registry (EESR).
